sentences.en: A teacher saw her gumption and mentored her.
sentences.cn: 一位老师看她很有进取心，给她进行辅导。

sentences.en: At least she had the gumption to phone me.
sentences.cn: 至少她有这个头脑，给我打了电话。

sentences.en: Certain will have big man gumption, There are responsibility meanwhile have a gentle heart.
sentences.cn: 一定要有大男人气概 、 有责任心同时有一颗平和的心.

sentences.en: Clearing out the wilderness by the Nolachucky River took grit and gumption.
sentences.cn: 沿诺兰查基河开拓荒野需要的是勇气和本事.

sentences.en: Dick was always diffident when to staff matters and not been ableto summonthe gumption tothe table.
sentences.cn: 遇到手下的人事问题时,迪克总是缺乏信心.他还未能发挥才智,一锤定音.

sentences.en: Fortunately you had enough gumption not to give up on yours.
sentences.cn: 幸亏你有这个毅力坚持自己的梦想.

sentences.en: He suspected that deep down, she admired him for having the gumption to disagree with her.
sentences.cn: 他认为，在内心深处她十分佩服他有勇气和她唱反调。

sentences.en: In part, that's because the economic power of fuhyo — rumor — is a force that even gumption and initiative can't combat.
sentences.cn: 从某种意义上来说，这是因为有害谣言的经济破坏力是进取心和主动性都无法压倒的。

sentences.en: Surely anyone with marketing gumption should be able to sell good books at any time of year.
sentences.cn: 无疑，有经营头脑的人在一年的任何时节都应该能够卖掉好书。

sentences.en: We're not talking playing ability. We're talking gumption.
sentences.cn: 我不是说打球的能力, 是说勇气.

sentences.en: With gumption and innovation, the enterprise develops unceasingly.
sentences.cn: 公司不断开拓 、 进取、创新.

sentences.en: With his gumption he will make a success of himself.
sentences.cn: 凭他的才干,他将大有作为.

words.tran_cn: 机灵的；精明能干的；精力充沛的

trans.tran_cn: <口>机智，足智多谋，进取精神，常识
trans.tran_en: the ability and determination to decide what needs to be done and to do it
